titleStmt.title: The lambs warre against the man of sinne the end of it, the manner of it, and what he wars against : his weapons, his colours, and his kingdom, and how all may know whether they be in it or no ...
titleStmt.author: Naylor, James, 1617?-1660.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Naylor by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
